attributes.action: reinstate the pre-pay envelopes which were supplied for VAT returns
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On October 1st 2008, the pre-paid envelope for completed VAT returns was withdrawn. For those who do not fill in their VAT return on-line and those who prefer to pay by cheque, it now costs money in the form of a stamp to collect the government's tax.
Although this is a tiny amount for each business, ethically it is wrong.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
